metadata.description: Name of the environment
Principal ID to grant access to the AI services. Leave empty to skip
Current principal type being used
IP addresses to grant access to the AI services. Leave empty to skip
Resource group name for the AI services. Defauts to rg-<environmentName>
Resource group name for the DNS configurations. Defaults to rg-dns
Tags for all AI resources created. JSON object
Allow or deny public network access to the AI services (recommended: Disabled)
Authentication type to use with Storage Account (recommended: identity)
Address prefixes for the spoke vNet
Address prefix for the private endpoint subnet
Address prefix for the application subnet
Name of the AI Services account. Automatically generated if left blank
Name of the AI Hub resource. Automatically generated if left blank
Name of the Storage Account. Automatically generated if left blank
Name of the Key Vault. Automatically generated if left blank
Name of the Bot Service. Automatically generated if left blank
Whether to deploy Azure AI Search service
Name of the AI Search Service. Automatically generated if left blank
Whether to deploy shared private links from AI Search
Whether to deploy an AI Hub
Whether to deploy a sample AI Project
Name of the Bot Service. Automatically generated if left blank
Name of the Cosmos DB Account. Automatically generated if left blank
Name of the App Service Plan. Automatically generated if left blank
Name of the App Services Instance. Automatically generated if left blank
Gen AI model name and version to deploy
Tokens per minute capacity for the model. Units of 1000 (capacity = 10 means 10,000 tokens per minute)
Language and version of the app to be deployed
Chat implementation to be used

properties.requestMessage: [format('Requested Private Endpoint Connection from Search Service {0}', parameters('searchName'))]
[format('Requested Private Endpoint Connection from Search Service {0}', parameters('searchName'))]

managedNetwork.outboundRules: [if(and(equals(parameters('publicNetworkAccess'), 'Disabled'), not(empty(parameters('searchName')))), createObject(format('rule-{0}', parameters('searchName')), createObject('type', 'PrivateEndpoint', 'destination', createObject('serviceResourceId', resourceId('Microsoft.Search/searchServices', parameters('searchName')), 'subresourceTarget', 'searchService'))), createObject())]

appSettings.name: SSO_MESSAGE_SUCCESS
appSettings.value: User logged in successfully! Please repeat your question.

appSettings.name: SSO_MESSAGE_FAILED
appSettings.value: Log in failed. Type anything to retry.

appSettings.name: LLM_INSTRUCTIONS
appSettings.value: Answer the questions as accurately as possible using the provided functions.
